channel.title: Need help with server website etc
channel.description: Iv'e folowed all the tutorials but none work cause i cant find database>new database its never there. SO can someone send me a good tutorial on making a website for my SERVER like they go to silabsoft.no-ip.org but its gona be rsaddict.no-ip.biz. And i wanna add Highscores etc.
